content.rendered:
Accreditations and Global Connections

The accreditation was first awarded to Colegio Gran Bretaña in 2004. The accreditation demonstrates our commitment to international education and continual improvement. Colleges and universities acknowledge that an Accredited School meets globally recognised standards and promotes qualities and skills that they are seeking in students.

Click here
  • Rigorous evaluation against internationally-agreed standards;
  • A blend of support and challenge, focused on a school’s development; and
  • A peer-based model that brings together international educators from across the world of CIS-accredited schools.

Our Second Accreditation with the New England Association of Schools and Collages (NEASC) ensures compliance with United States standards and thus facilitates the transfer of US students back to their home country, as well as the admissions process into US Universities.

Round Square is a worldwide network of innovative schools in 50 countries that creates adventure opportunities through International Service for our students.

The mission of the LAHC is to bring together centres of educational excellence reflecting the best of British and international educational practice in order to share expertise for school improvement in a spirit of reciprocal altruism that benefits all parties.

The association caters specifically for schools which give special importance to the English language, both as a medium for communication and as a language of teaching and learning.

CGB'S ACCREDITATIONS AND AFFILIATIONS

This is the curriculum used for children in Nursery and Reception. In English VESS stands for a Meaningful Life with balance and Wisdom.
This is the curriculum used for children in Nursery and Reception. In English VESS stands for a Meaningful Life with balance and Wisdom.
The International Primary Curriculum is followed in classes from Year 1 to Year 6.
The International Primary Curriculum is followed in classes from Year 1 to Year 6.
The International Middle Years Curriculum is followed in Year 7 to 9.
The International Middle Years Curriculum is followed in Year 7 to 9.
The International General Certificate of Secondary Education, from Cambridge Assessment, is followed in Years 10 and 11.
The International General Certificate of Secondary Education, from Cambridge Assessment, is followed in Years 10 and 11.
The International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme is followed in Years 12 and 13.
The International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme is followed in Years 12 and 13.
Union of International Schools allows our students to compete in sporting events and participate in artistic festivals with other international schools in Bogotá.
Union of International Schools allows our students to compete in sporting events and participate in artistic festivals with other international schools in Bogotá.
New England Association of Schools and Colleges is one of our external auditors and allows us to present our graduates with a US High School Diploma.
New England Association of Schools and Colleges is one of our external auditors and allows us to present our graduates with a US High School Diploma.
The Round Square Organisation opens up the world to our students through exchanges, conferences and the RS IDEALS.
The Round Square Organisation opens up the world to our students through exchanges, conferences and the RS IDEALS.
Latin American Heads Conference allows staff and students to participate in annual conferences with other international schools in latin America.
Latin American Heads Conference allows staff and students to participate in annual conferences with other international schools in latin America.
Andean Association of IB Schools in Colombia.
Andean Association of IB Schools in Colombia.
Cambridge Assessment International Education.
Cambridge Assessment International Education.
Council of International Schools is one of our external auditors.
Council of International Schools is one of our external auditors.
